Unusual volume or pattern of DNS queries.Action: Monitor Zeek dns.log for queries originating from external IP addresses. Analyze query volume per source IP and query types. Use statistical analysis (e.g., calculating Z-scores or IQR on query volume) to identify external sources exhibiting unusually high query rates against a variety of internal hostnames or record types.

Attempted or successful DNS zone transfe.Action: If Zeek logs query types, filter Zeek dns.log for AXFR queries and correlate with source IPs. (Note: Zone transfer logging may require specific configuration on DNS server itself, which may be Windows Event Logs or other server logs not covered by the requested scope).
